name: com.silicolabs.thingsplussubset
description: The subset of THINGSplus CC0 images that start with the letter a.

source.attribution: Stoinski, L. M., Perkuhn, J., & Hebart, M. N. (2024). THINGSplus: New norms and metadata for the THINGS database of 1854 object concepts and 26,107 natural object images. Behavior Research Methods, 56(3), 1583-1603.
